entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
